Dilution Sheet for `r compound`
========================================================
```{r, echo=FALSE}
stockmake = readRDS("/Users/tylershimko/Andersen-Lab-Code/Dilutions/stockmake.rds")
recipe = readRDS("/Users/tylershimko/Andersen-Lab-Code/Dilutions/recipe.rds")
rawLysate = sum(as.numeric(as.character(recipe[,5])))
rawSmed = sum(as.numeric(as.character(recipe[,3])))
adjLysate = rawLysate * (1+(1/60))
tot = adjLysate * 10
adjSmed = tot - adjLysate
slmix = paste("Dilute", adjLysate, "µL lysate in", adjSmed, "µL S medium.")
for (i in seq(1,length(recipe))){
  colnames(recipe)[i] = sprintf("%03s",colnames(recipe)[i])
}
```
Make concentrated stock solution:

```{r, echo = FALSE}
stockmake
```

Make the S Medium/Lysate mix:
```{r, echo = FALSE}
slmix
```

Dilute down to final concentrations:

```{r, echo = FALSE}
recipe[,c(1,2,3,4,6)]
```
